dc_title_s: A new map of Upper & Lower Canada from the latest authorities
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially.; Canada east of Lake Winnipeg to Labrador.; Shows boundaries, rivers, forests and settlements.; "53" pasted in upper right margin.|44 x 51 centimeters, on sheet 49 x 55 centimeters|Scale [ca. 1:2,250,000]|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Published by J. Cary,  engraver and map seller (London)
